name: Temporal Escape
description:
Hi all!

Sigo, Asheko and myself worked over 72 hours to present to you Temporal Escape, our submission for the Ludum Dare 51!

Play as a time-bending Ninja stuck in a time-loop. Defeat your opponents by slashing through the time-space continuum and try to escape the grasp of the Godly Owl and its never-ending loop!

Here is a list of the inputs:

  • WASD / ZQSD: up/down/left/right movements.
  • Mouse Left click: Slash everything in front of you!
  • Mouse Right Click (can be held): Dashes where the cursor is.
  • Space: Activate your ultimate ability!
  • Escape: Exit the game...

Thank you all for playing and giving our game a try!
Cheers!
